output:
NMAP Command Reference: -sS

[COMMAND]
-sS

[NAME]
SYN scan (stealth)

[DESCRIPTION]
Half-open scan, doesn't complete TCP handshake

[COMMON USE CASES]
- reconnaissance
- service enumeration
- vulnerability scanning
- host discovery

[EXAMPLE USAGE]
```
# Basic usage with -sS
nmap -sS [options] target
```

[DOCUMENTATION]
- Verify tool is in scope
- Document command and results
- Consider operational security implications
